# Tortoise ORM GIS

This package is intended to provide support for GIS Operations to Tortoise ORM.

Currently it only supports PostGIS and **IS NOT** production ready.

Roadmap:

-   [] Support Geometry
-   [] Support Geography
-   [] Support SpatiaLite
